_header: Lent is an holy time / In which folk will them shrive
_description: Poem on Shrift, based on the last 92 lines of the Quadragesima section in the South English Legendary — quatrains (abab or abcb) with one six-line stanza (aabccb)

CULDd11.First Lines:
LEnten is an holy tymeIn which folk wile hem
                    schryue…
CULDd11.Last Lines: …to come to cristis tableat Estern tyme Amen
CULDd11.Editions:
Funke,  Otto,
                        ed.  
             A Middle English Reader.
         Bern: A. Francke, 1944: 48-9.
